repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Auburn (N.Y.) Area Labor Council is part the New York State AFL-CIO which is a federation of 3,000 affiliated public sector, private sector, and building trades unions throughout the state, representing 2.5 million members, retirees and their families

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council Memorabilia #5892 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5892: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council Records 5892 AV: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council Audio-Visual Materials 5892 mf: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council "Meeting Minutes of the Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council" and Amalgamated Meat Cutters, Butcher Workmen and Affiliated Crafts of North America on Microfilm

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 'Wm. H. Post' ; 'Douglass Williams' ; Charles DeChick ; Area Labor council AFL-CIO Meeting, Tuesday 8 P.M.
